verifyEmail.title: Enter the 6 digit code received by email

isNotVerifyEmailValid.title: Too Many Attempts
isNotVerifyEmailValid.description: You've attempted too many times to connect to your account. We've sent you a code by email to continue

isEmailUnconfirmed.title: Verify Your Email
isEmailUnconfirmed.description: To confirm your account, we have sent you a code to your email address.
